1. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^[[Working with the model inventory](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models)]

1. The current status of the project is displayed under [model status]{.smallcaps}. 

   While your lifecycle statuses and workflows are custom to your organization, some examples are:

      - `In Documentation` — The model is currently being documented and can be submitted for validation next.
      - `In Validation` — The model is currently being validated and can be submitted for review and then approval.

1. Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See Workflow** to visualize the entire workflow that this model will go through.
